name: Dancing Balls-Rolling Ahead Go
description:
The most challenging and interesting Dj Music game where various obstacles make you addicted.

Drag the ball left or right and avoid all obstacles. Make your ball just dancing in the splendid 3D effect scene. Make your speed and reaction grow up. Now, Are you ready? Let's go dancing!

Features:
• Simple operation but challenging
• Amazing 3D stereo world
• A challenge to speed and reflex
